findings.title: Missing address verification
findings.description: Certain functions lack a safety check in the address, the address-type argument should include a zero-address test, otherwise, the contract's functionality may become inaccessible or tokens.

findings.title: Missing Decimal
findings.description: The MaxCap value can be mistakenly initialized to any value without decimals, causing tokens to reach max capacity. It's recommended to set MaxCap value in 18 decimals or multiply it by 10**18.

findings.title: Missing Zero Check
findings.description: Contracts lack zero address checks, hence are prone to be initialized with zero addresses.
